article:

Nuts are healthy but they aren't all created   _  . If you're eatingalmonds  or brazil nuts -- well done, they are good for you. Peanuts on the other hand are not your   _  . They probably have the least nutritional  _  from

Fruit juice is another dangerous one. Most fruit juice contains too much   _  . Check the

Dried fruit is   _  classed as "healthy food". It is and it isn't. A handful of dried
fruit is much better than a bar of chocolate.  _  too
much dried fruit on a daily basis is only going to increase your sugar intake.
Whatever you   _  to consume, make sure you do it inmoderation . Stick to a   _  diet
